PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-05982019-05-31,  NRCAN,  ,  , 
ActEnergy Efficiency Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Energy Efficiency Regulations, 2016 (Amendment 15)
PrecisRegulations Amending the ENERGY EFFICIENCY REGULATIONS, 2016 (AMENDMENT 15) in order to (1) reduce GREENHOUSE GAS EMISSIONS and energy consumption associated with energy-using products in a manner that aligns with other jurisdictions, where feasible and appropriate; and (2) reduce energy costs assumed by households, businesses and institutions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0164 Publication Date: 2019-06-12
AttachmentsAttachment
